mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOODMATE_RECIPE ( RCP_ID, BYR_ID, TITLE, MAINIMG_PATH, FOOD_NAME, CATEGORY_ID, REQ_TIME, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( FOODMATE_RECIPE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{byr_id}, #{title}, #{mainimg_path}, #{food_name}, #{category_id}, #{req_time}, #{description} )
INSERT INTO FOODMATE_RECIPE_INGREDIENT (RCP_ID, INGRD_NAME, INGRD_QTY, UNIT) VALUES (#{rcp_id}, #{ingrd_name}, #{ingrd_qty}, #{unit})
INSERT INTO FOODMATE_RECIPE_STEP (RCP_ID, RCP_STEP, STEP_DESC, STEPIMG_PATH) VALUES (#{rcp_id}, #{rcp_step}, #{step_desc}, #{stepimg_path})
mapper.select: SELECT R.RCP_ID, R.BYR_ID, BP.NICKNAME, R.CATEGORY_ID, R.TITLE, R.MAINIMG_PATH, R.FOOD_NAME, R.REQ_TIME, R.DESCRIPTION, R.STATUS, R.CREATE_DATE FROM FOODMATE_RECIPE R LEFT JOIN FOODMATE_BUYER_PROFILE BP ON R.BYR_ID = BP.BYR_ID WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.RCP_ID, R.BYR_ID, BP.NICKNAME, R.CATEGORY_ID, R.TITLE, R.MAINIMG_PATH, R.FOOD_NAME, R.REQ_TIME, R.DESCRIPTION, R.STATUS, R.CREATE_DATE FROM FOODMATE_RECIPE R LEFT JOIN FOODMATE_BUYER_PROFILE BP ON R.BYR_ID = BP.BYR_ID WHERE R.BYR_ID = #{byr_id}
SELECT * FROM FOODMATE_RECIPE_STEP WHERE RCP_ID = #{rcp_id} ORDER BY RCP_STEP ASC
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, NAME, PARENT_ID FROM FOODMATE_RECIPE_CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_ID IS NULL
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, NAME FROM FOODMATE_RECIPE_CATEGORY START WITH CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} CONNECT BY PRIOR PARENT_ID = CATEGORY_ID ORDER BY LEVEL DESC
